entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider re-designing the Blazor WASM authentication stack #40764
  • Simplify setting W3C Trace Context in SignalR browser clients #40763
  • Add the property NavLink.IsActive and the event handler NavLink.ActivationChanged #40762
  • Configure WebApplicationBuilder directly instead of with ConfigureWebHostDefaults #40761
  • Hot Reload not working with Razor cshtml in Azure Functions #40759
  • [Blazor][Wasm] Set oidc Authentication Options to Local Storage #40757
    Backlog
  • WebHostBuilderExtensions UseStartup() uses incorrect logic to determine AssemblyName #40755
  • Using WithSummary() for Minimal API endpoints does not render when using Swashbuckle.AspNetCore #40753
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Cannot bind StringValues for optional HTTP request header with Minimal APIs #40752
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Ignore Null Properties #40751
  • Filtering SignalR ping messages #40750
  • Blazor WASM site not working on iOS 15.4 / iPhone 13 #40749
  • Upgrade `Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect` dependency to use none-blocking method `ValidateTokenAsync` #40748
  • HttpRequest with leading \r before request-line rejected with BadRequestException #40747
  • CVE-2022-0778 security vulnerability on .net aspnet core 6 runtime #40746

Closed

  • Drag & Drop #18754
    Backlog
  • IIS HTTP/2 features version check wrong? #40756
  • How to change Blazor Wasm stand-alone to hosted #40739
  • Make RateLimiters disposable #38308
    7.0-preview2
  • SignalR negotiation sometimes fails on the first attempt #40413
  • Cant get the Site to work on Publish #40722
  • IHostBuilder.Build() times out after 5 seconds when running integration tests with WebApplicationFactory<T> on slow machines #40715
  • Net.Maui Blazor not running on Android 7.1 Tablet #39086
    7.0-preview3
  • Blazor is NOT loosing SignalR connection. Browser is! #40721
  • Email Generation Using Blazor #40758
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 in HTTP.sys #40728
    7.0-preview3
  • Adding feature to Router for custom language URL #40736
  • Use server garbage collection in the Worker Service project template #39578
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor hosted site thorw 503 on IIS and IIS Express, works fine in kestrel #40494
  • After updating to .Net6 An unhandled exception occurred while processing the request. <component type="typeof(App)" render-mode="ServerPrerendered" /> #40593
  • CORS preflight requests is not properly evaluated? + unclear CORS documentation #40616

PullRequests

Created

  • Update MAUI Exception Handling #40765
    area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40760
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Stop using optional catch binding in JSInterop #40737
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview3
  • Support falling back to ConnectionId when RawConnectionId is 0 on HTTP.sys #40733
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Regenerate compiled DeveloperExceptionPage views #40711
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview3

Updated

  • Avoiding `ParameterBindingMethodCache` exceptions in MVC #40738
    area-mvc
  • Include arm64 payloads for hosting bundle #40709
    area-infrastructure
  • Adding a new ActionResult to process IResult #40710
    area-mvc
  • Consume HostApplicationBuilder from WebApplicationBuilder #40459
    area-runtime
  • Cleanup logs after successful test runs #40411
    area-infrastructure
  • Publish some installer artifacts for testing #40647
    area-infrastructure
  • Update CODEOWNERS #40664
    area-infrastructure
  • Blazor Prevent Stale Connection Usage Upon Reconnect #40702
    area-blazor
  • Get richnav.yml building again #40729
    area-infrastructure
